item.title: Oil Extends Gains on Russia-Ukraine War Escalation Fears
item.description: Oil extended gains in European afternoon trade, based on growing fears of an escalation in the war between Russia and Ukraine.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as Post-Election Selloff Tempts In New Buyers
item.description: Gold futures rise as the heavy selloff post-U.S. election shifts into reverse.
